channel.title: Pie Chart on
channel.description: Recent content in Pie Chart on

item.title: Stupidest pie chart of the year 2011
item.description: I’ve just been looking at the Stupidest bar chart of the year 2011 and I’ve been inspired to submit my Stupidest pie chart of the year 2011. I won’t say from where I obtained it and I’ve drawn the data myself to save from annoying the original authors. And here it is (click to enlarge):
